channel.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
channel.description:
Hello I would this configuration sys-whonix-->proxyVM-->appVM (not anon-whonix) I created a VPN configuration in network manager but when I try to connect the VPN fail, while if I connect the same VPN to a normal proxy machine, works. Do I change anything in sys-whonix? Or is a problem of my VPN?
Thank you

item.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Chapter https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN#Separate_VPN-Gateway was recently refined by @0brand.

Read full topic
item.source: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix

item.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: tasket
item.description:
Hi Patrick: Interestingly, openvpn would only report “TCP connection reset” when I used the native port 1194. Switching to port 443 works, though. VPN providers may only support TCP on an alternate port number.

Read full topic
item.source: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix

item.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is expected. I added this fact and the reasoning for that to
documentation after your report.

Read full topic

item.description:
Yes, TCP works, UDP no

item.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: eprer
item.description:
Patrick:

This is now documented here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN#Separate_VPN-Gateway

Recommended order of reading:

  1. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Introduction

  2. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN

  3. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN#Separate_VPN-Gateway

Thank you Patrick!
Some VPN connect while others no

Read full topic

item.title: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please use the same way to describe the terminology / connection scheme that you want to accomplish as under the following wiki page.

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...

Otherwise due to the great complexity of the topic it is very easy to talk past one another.

It it this ticket?

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Test and document VPN ProxyVM between anon-whonix and sys-whonix

opened by andrewdavidwong on 2016-06-11
closed by andrewdavidwong on 2016-06-20 
Patrick Schleizer wrote:
Andrew David Wong:
On 2016-06-08 13:15, a...r@s...t.org wrote:
Hello I read the guide on whonix site about how setup a VPN...
C: Whonix C: doc P: minor enhancement help wanted privacy

For now, undocumented, unsupported. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Unsupported )

I have a look if I can get that documented, don’t hold your breath for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Setup a VPN in ProxyVM over sys-whonix
